sections.title: Program of the 1980 ACL Meeting
paragraphs: The 18th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics and Parasession on Topics in Interactive Discourse will be held at the University of Pennsylvania, in Philadelphia, Thursday, June 19,

sections.title: through
paragraphs: Sunday, June 22, 1980. Twenty-five contributed papers will be presented in four morning sessions, and a parasession panel will be held on each of the first three afternoons. The program committee was chaired by Gary Hendrix,

sections.title: SRI International,
paragraphs: and consisted of Charles Fillmore,

sections.title: University of California,
paragraphs: Jane Robinson,

sections.title: SR1 International,
paragraphs: Ivan Sag,

sections.title: Stanford University,
paragraphs: Henry Thompson,

sections.title: Xerox PARC,
paragraphs: and Robert Wilensky,

sections.title: University of California.
paragraphs: The parasession was organized by Bonnie Lynn Webber,

sections.title: University of Pennsylvania.
paragraphs: Local arrangements are being handled by Kathleen McKeown,

sections.title: University of Pennsylvania.
paragraphs: Copies of the proceedings will be available at the time of the conference. WEDNESDAY, JUNE 18, 1980 6:00-10:00 P.M.
